tha-ap192:0.3_0: Hearing this aside the load of the senior monks, the junior ones, and the junior ones.
tha-ap192:11.1_0: he’s a figure, free of snares,
tha-ap192:11.3_0: The Bodhi, and the supreme being intent on awakening;
tha-ap192:4.2_0: though you fly away and flee.
tha-ap192:4.4_0: but I’ll go to the underworld.
tha-ap192:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap192:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Āṭānāṭiya.
tha-ap192:8.1_0: The wound was in decrepit and the tenth parts.
tha-ap192:9.1_0: The group of nine on the barley leaf huts, is finished.
